person.persName: John B. Lendrum (Kenton County, Kentucky,city clerk and bookkeeper)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, city clerk and bookkeeper. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth Lendrum. Father of Thomas W. Lendrum, Harry S. Lendrum, and Lillie H. Lendrum. City clerk in Covington in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Kenton County in 1850. Bookkeeper in Covington in 1860. Employed Jane Blackburn and Frank Garrish as servants in 1860.
